experiences.title: Career Peer Advisor @ UBC Sauder Business Career Centre
experiences.description: I'm 1 of 9 students coaching UBC Sauder students, with a focus on the BUCS (business + computer science) path!

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern @ TELUS
experiences.description: Drove automation and AI innovation for the Ops Capital Management team managing a billion-dollar budget.

experiences.title: Solutions Engineer Intern @ Trulioo
experiences.description: Supported B2B SaaS sales deals as technical experts for Trulioo: an identity verification unicorn!

experiences.title: Software Engineer + Business Systems Analyst Co-op @ ICBC
experiences.description: Built automation tools for ICBC‚Äôs Business Innovation and RPA team. Became first co-op to adopt a dual software engineer / business systems analyst role.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern @ Cyberium Group
experiences.description: Implemented governance, risk, and compliance solutions for clients in a nimble 10-person cybersecurity startup.

experiences.title: COMM 190 TA @ UBC Sauder
experiences.description: TA'd COMM 190: Quantitative Decision Analysis, Linear Programming + Probability after scoring 100 in the course.

projects.title: TELUS Form Coach
projects.description: A new feature on the TELUS Health & Wellbeing app that evaluates your exercise form with computer vision. After winning, our team is now exploring ways to integrate this solution into existing TELUS products and services!

projects.title: Nerve
projects.prize: üèÜ 2nd Place + üèÜ Startup Winner - UBC BizTech ProductX
projects.description: Competed alongside three other Kevins. A real-time monitoring dashboard for emergency dispatch units, powered with sentiment analysis and critical event detection. We modernized existing legacy systems that are outdated and have lead to lost lives, lost time, and lost resources.

projects.title: HackHarvard @ Harvard University
projects.description: Stay tuned! Will be at HackHarvard 2025.

projects.title: Meme-o-Tron
projects.description: We built a Jumbotron lookalike cam, like those you might see at hockey games! Upload a photo and prepare to get roasted.

projects.title: UBC Esports Lounge App
projects.description: Replaced a manual lounge check-in process with a sleek web app! Currently exploring a new monorepo architecture for the backend as we roll out new features for UBC's gaming community.

projects.title: Cal Hacks 12.0 @ UC Berkeley
projects.description: Stay tuned! Will be at Cal Hacks 2025.

projects.title: Dance Dance ReVision
projects.description: Dance-Dance ReVision brings you the classic Dance-Dance Revolution (DDR) arcade rhythm game right to your computer. Dance with computer vision!

projects.title: UBCMA Membership Portal
projects.description: A full-stack web app for the UBC Marketing Association memberships supporting event registration, payment processing, and member management.

projects.title: Computer Networking Projects
projects.description: A collection of projects from UBC'S CPSC 317: Computer Networking written in Java and C. The projects primarily cover socket programming and various network protocols. The source code cannot be shared due to academic integrity policies.

cases.title: VSEUS x 180 Degrees Consulting Case Competition
cases.description: Presented recommendations to increase Teaboco's UBC presence and obtain a B Corp Certification through influencer marketing and in-person campus partnerships.

cases.title: UBC Imprint Marketing Case Competition Final Round
cases.description: Tackled new product growth for TELUS MyPet by implementing an AI Assistant, introducing hybrid pricing, designing a new vet directory and funding partnerships.

cases.title: UBC Imprint Marketing Case Competition Preliminary Round
cases.description: Implemented a master rebrand for TELUS to showcase its diverse product lines and help them STAND OUT, SHARE OUT, and HELP OUT.

cases.title: UBC Product Sprint Product Challenge
cases.description: Presented Hootsuite Connect: A new feature to connect brand influencers with businesses to create authentic social media content.

cases.title: UBC eProjects Pitchathon
cases.description: Presented Microsoft RUBY: a new city-wide dispatch system for emergency services to reduce response times and save lives, implemented with Microsoft Azure IoT services.

cases.title: JDC West Summer Development Initial Case Round
cases.description: Presented a two-pronged approach: Uber For Us and Uber For You to tackle regulatory hurdles, driver trust, and geographic variance.

cases.title: UBCMA Studios Pro Bono Consulting
cases.description: Consulted for a local Vancouver jewelry business by building their brand identity, designing a new website, and developing a multi-channel marketing strategy with Meta Ads, SEO, influencer partnerships, and social media content.

cases.title: COMM 296 Case Assignment
cases.description: Presented a new Apple creator network and a new app interface to connect creators, influencers, and marketing voices for the Apple ecosystem. Class cases are kept proprietary.

cases.title: COMM 396 Industry Research Case
cases.description: Completed a market research report on Salesforce's Solutions Engineer role, and the company's overall position in the CRM market. Performed industry analysis and researched the future roadmap of Agentforce. Class cases are kept proprietary.

cases.title: COMM 396 Community Assessment Case
cases.description: Presented new recommendations for Shopify to expand business in Richmond, BC with Indigenous communities through partnerships, grants, and educational resources. Class cases are kept proprietary.

cases.title: UBC ProduHacks x EY Product Challenge
cases.description: Presented a prototype for WallEY, a new NFT-based platform to manage loyalty rewards programs.

extracurriculars.title: nwPlus
extracurriculars.description: We're Western Canada's largest hackathon organizer, with 3 every year: HackCamp, nwHacks, and cmd-f. We're MLH-affiliated, supporting 1250+ hackers across our events!

extracurriculars.title: UBC Marketing Association (UBCMA)
extracurriculars.description: We're UBC's only marketing focused student club, bringing you events and opportunities to learn about marketing, network with industry professionals, and build your skills.

extracurriculars.title: UBC Esports Association (UBCEA)
extracurriculars.description: UBC's gaming club! We host events, tournaments, and come by the gaming lounge in the Nest to unwind between (or during) your classes.

extracurriculars.title: Sauder Summit International Case Competition
extracurriculars.description: Annual case competition hosted by the Sauder School of Business, bringing together top students from around the world to solve real business challenges.

extracurriculars.title: Enactus UBC
extracurriculars.description: We're UBC's branch for Enactus, a global non-profit organization dedicated to inspiring students to improve the world through entrepreneurial action.

extracurriculars.title: National Strategy Consulting Case Competition & Conference (NSCC)
extracurriculars.description: Sauder's top case competition 2025! We're Canada's premier strategy case competition and conference for all things consulting.

extracurriculars.title: HelloHacks by UBC BizTech
extracurriculars.description: A beginner-friendly hackathon hosted by UBC BizTech, one of UBC's largest tech clubs.

extracurriculars.title: BUCS Community Team
extracurriculars.description: Fostering community and events for UBC Sauder's business and computer science (BUCS) students.

extracurriculars.title: UBC Sauder Orientations
extracurriculars.description: Welcoming first years to UBC Sauder with fun events, mentorship, and community building!
